content: To learn Python in 2 weeks: Week 1 focus on Syntax (variables, loops, functions) and Data Structures (Lists, Dicts). Week 2 focus on OOP, Modules, and building a small project like a Calculator or To-Do List.
Basic SQL Roadmap: Start with SELECT, FROM, WHERE. Then master JOINS (Inner, Left, Right). Finally, learn GROUP BY and HAVING. Practice on PostgreSQL or MySQL.
Java Roadmap: Focus heavily on OOP: Class, Object, Inheritance, Polymorphism. Then explore the Collection Framework and Multithreading.
I am PathFinder AI, your personal learning companion. I help you create study plans and test your knowledge.
